# timingCurveType

**Instance Property**

The type of timing information to use.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var timingCurveType: UITimingCurveType { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify the type of timing information your timing curve object supplies. The value of this property determines whether the view property animator uses the object in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITimingCurveProvider/cubicTimingParameters] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITimingCurveProvider/springTimingParameters] property for timing information.

## Getting the timing information

- **cubicTimingParameters**: The cubic timing parameters to use.
- **springTimingParameters**: The spring-based timing parameters to use.
